name: Batman Arkham Asylum - The Road to Arkham Digital PSP Comic
summary: The road to Arkham offers readers the chance to experience firsthand the story of how Batman™ single-handedly brought two of Gotham's hardest criminals to the asylum. Follow the in-depth story behind the capture of Zsasz and The Joker and along the way uncover additional hidden secrets surrounding the goings on in Arkham.
